executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Focus specifically on testing task loading behavior after prolonged app idle time, app lifecycle (background/foreground transitions), memory leaks, stuck loading states, and cache expiration scenarios. Test the app's behavior when:
1. App remains open for more than 5 minutes without interaction
2. App goes to background and returns after extended period
3. Multiple rapid resume/pause cycles
4. Network disconnection and reconnection
5. Cache expiration scenarios
6. Stuck loading states that require force refresh
